nodes.text: The Londori sector was located in the New Territories portion of the Mid Rim. By 0 ABY, it bordered the Ariarch sector northward, the Glythe sector eastward, the Chaama sector southward, and the Belshar sector westward. The Londori sector retained these borders by 12 ABY, when it fell within the territory controlled by the New Republic.
The sector contained the Londor system, which was connected by hyperlanes to the adjacent Ariarch, Glythe, and Chaama sectors. The system was the site of the Londori Mental Facility.

The Londor sector was introduced in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas. The first update to the Online Companion erroneously listed the Londor system as being located in the "Gantus" sector of the Outer Rim Territories, a misspelling of the Outer Rim's Dantus sector. Later updates of the Online Companion corrected this error.
